lead_paragraph: Australian Paralympic cyclist Michael Gallagher has been handed a mandatory provisional suspension by Cycling Australia and the Australian Paralympic Committee after testing positive for erythropoietin (EPO).

headline.print_headline: Australian Cycling Champion Banned for Doping
headline.main: Australian Cycling Champion Banned for Doping
